website_summaries.verdict: The brand’s release of its first-ever spikeless golf shoe has overjoyed many Adidas fans. The addition of the X-Traction has caught the eye of the consumers and putting it to the test has not disappointed. Despite the new feature of this Adidas shoe, comfort, and style are not traded off, which comes highly appreciated by many. Its overall rating is superb and many would strongly recommend it. However, a few commenters have felt displeased with issues of flaking on some parts of the shoe.
pros: Many emphasize the importance of wearing a comfortable golf shoe
this Adidas trainer definitely qualifies as one, based on user reviews
The Boost sole is one-of-a-kind in providing comfort, according to several consumers
The rebound can be felt on each step
It is a quality product that can be availed at an excellent price, say some purchasers
Several golf enthusiasts are impressed with the trainer’s X-shaped lugs
They render traction on any surface condition
The waterproofing feature performs well under all types of weather conditions, say a couple of wearers
A handful of style-savvy commenters admire that this shoe marries style and comfort
The spikeless Tour360 XT supplies reliable arch support that is not exaggerated
cons: Some have expressed disappointment in experiencing flaking on certain parts of the shoe, specifically on the toe and where the creasing appears
One complains about the durability of the toe area
It starts to rip after only three wears

customer_reviews.title: good grip spikeless golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing these shoes for a long time. the shoe fits almost to size. i find that there is a bit of tightness on the top of my feet. after two rounds of golf, it got a bit looser. Hitting off the turf mats provided a grabby traction. off grass, it is perfect. The X soles are soft so time will tell how long they will last. Leather top is nice and I get compliments on the color combo. Folks with wider feet may have pressure on the sides of their feet. i woudl get a half size larger if I had to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Hou-man

customer_reviews.title: I'll go spikeless
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the shoes after 2 early morning rounds w/heavy dew. Feet stayed dry and no slipping. Fit and appearance are good. These are my first spikeless. They do hold more sand when exiting a trap and cut grass in general than my regular soft spikes. Seems to be the nature of all spikeless shoes according to others. I'll go spikeless in the future. Besides it looks like Dustin Johnson wears the same shoe. Doesn't improve my driving distance though..
customer_reviews.author: Bear Paw

customer_reviews.title: Watch the size
customer_reviews.text: I have heard great things about the shoe, ordered a 14 wide as I wear a 14 D in all other shoes with no issue. The foot box was still too tight and they rubber my ankle bone. Easy return process but Adidas runs small and narrow, take this into consideration if coming from another brand.
customer_reviews.author: dave 209

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort AND Support
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying cheaper golf shoes, but they get mushy after one season. So, was looking for better support and comfort. These shoes are great. They are very comfortable but definitely have a lot of support-feet don't shift around in them even though the toe box is ample with no toes rubbing the inside. Importantly, after a round of golf my heels are usually very sore. But, I had no heel pain after a round in these shoes. I consider them a great find and an excellent product. Although folks say they run a little small, I am between a 10.5 and 11 medium and I tried them both and went with the 10.5, which fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable 2 Yr WP Golf Shoes in the Market
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few "full leather 2 year waterproof" golf shoes over the past couple of year and the Tour360 XT spikeless from adidas are by far the most comfortable I've worn. They were great out of the box and ever more comfortable after 18 which is a good sign. Traction and stability both excellent as you'd expect from a "tour level" shoe, but walking comfort was the major standpoint. For $120'ish I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cavan Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but quality is aweful
customer_reviews.text: Took a few rounds to break in the heel then the foam tore? - about a month of play ugh. - quality control???
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Woods

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT cushioning for tender feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have developed an intolerance of spiked golf shoes for walking the course. Three pairs from Nike, Ecco, and FootJoy all are fine for riding, but not walking. This is my first pair of spikeless shoes. I am very impressed at how well they stick to the ground during the swing, even in the sand. The outsoles are firm and stable, and the midsoles are wonderful. No pain over 61⁄2 miles of walking!
customer_reviews.author: wjg686

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the rebound you feel from each step. I would warn people with sensitive arches that the arch support is very noticeable but I really love the comfort it gives me. One more disclaimer is the amount of roll on your leaf foot during a shot. If you like a more supportive lead foot...you may not like these as they tend to roll more than your average golf shoe. All in all, this is probably more comfortable than any tennis shoe I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: I researched new golf shoes a bunch and I bought these because the were priced right and full leather. At first I thought they were a bit tight but now after a few rounds they fit perfectly and am really glad that I bought them. They are quite heavy if you are planning to walk the round but are excellent quality for the money. I also have worn them in morning dew conditions and they keep my feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: KMick

customer_reviews.title: Great spikeless golf shoe at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These have held up great for a few rounds of golf. They’ve seen a mix of walking and cart play. I usually wear an 11.5 or 12 in other shoes (ie. Nike’s). I went with 11.5 wide and it was a great choice. After a couple of wears they’ve broke in and become pretty comfy. So far they’ve got better than several Footjoys I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Bree & Eric W.

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit for me
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking golf shoes, unfortunately way too narrow in lace area, actual foot fit fine but huge gap especially in left foot at tongue/lace area(10 med). Amazon very professional in return-did not go with different size as I never had this odd fitting problem before and did not think wider would work with heel and toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of spikeless shoes and they were just fine on the course. This is my third overall pair of Tour 360 shoes and this latest model doesn't disappoint. My other two pairs lasted several years and I expect the same out of this pair.
customer_reviews.author: S. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe good value
customer_reviews.text: They’re not as stable feeling as my Boost with spikes but they’re still a pretty good shoe. Also, they have a little less height to the heels than the spiked version- feels like you’re walking uphill at first. Overall, I’d say 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Famoudou II

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding shoes that are comfortable. When I first wore them for a round, it was only when I was changing my shoes that I remembered they were new. Really good fit, comfortable, and I like the cleatless design.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit short and narrow. Comfortable with good support.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 12 D. Tried the 12 regular and it was way too narrow and short. I have the 12.5 on now, but still very narrow in arch area. As you can see, the eyelets are very far apart. Otherwise right length. Moral to the story? Order a half size big and go wide.
customer_reviews.author: Doug L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: Don’t underestimate the importance of a comfortable golf shoe. After upgrading from my inexpensive, ill fitting shoes, I can’t recommend these enough. I actually played better because I was able to focus on my game instead of my hurting feet. These things are like walking on clouds. And hey, they look great as well! What more could you ask for? Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Stylish shoes with traction and stability
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes...I like that Adidas fits somewhat narrower than many brands and is one of the reasons that I selected these shoes. Expect them to last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect! I have a slim foot so I was worried they’d be too wide but they’re not. They also didn’t need a lot to break in, a couple of hours on the range and I was ready to golf
customer_reviews.author: arnold

customer_reviews.title: Good to walk 18 in
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe but had to return the first pair which were too snug so had to switch to a size 14 (I’m normally a13) and unfortunately they did not have the all black version which is the shoe I really wanted
customer_reviews.author: BloomingSmith

customer_reviews.title: Wish they would fix the heel design
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes but the high heel back. I’ve gotten heel blisters on both feet from these shoes. Beyond that, if I remember to put bandaids on the heel, the stability, arch support, traction, comfort, and appearance of these shoes is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy them don’t wait
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and felt amazing all day at the course. My right foot has some issues and had no pain and felt like on clouds. No slip in the spineless either.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy walking the course & these shoes fit the bill. They are just as comfortable as my Adidas Boost running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Williams

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than you expect.
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than expected. Perfect fit; exactly as advertised. More comfortable than Footjoy Pro S/L. Well worth the price. I walk and these were ready for 18 holes right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K90

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Played my first round with these shoes and the feel was so comfortable..I plan on ordering another pair as soon as possible. Also my feet were completely dry..
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoe; feels like a well made product. I do agree with others that the show is a bit narrow. I then tried to get the size 13 in wide, but no one has wide anymore, likely because they are narrow. I still like the quality of the product. I just wish it could make me into a scratch golfer. Now that would be a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fell apart
customer_reviews.text: After having these for 3 weeks and only golfing in them, the sole of the shoe (under the ball of the foot on the outside) split apart needing to be glued back together - both shoes, not just one. These are definitely not made to last considering you only wear them on the golf course. Sizing is good and is a very comfortable wide golf shoe if they lasted longer than 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the style and being all leather.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for tennis shoes because you can’t find all leather ones. He lives them and the great arch support and design.
customer_reviews.author: Donnette

customer_reviews.title: Great except the white foam cushion cracked and broke in a month.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome except of one fault. The cushion white foam on the sole breaks up and tears. I had the shoes for 1 month and there was a crack in the foam part which is too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a friend to give to her boyfriend, and he loves them! He said they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kristal DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort +
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cushioning makes walking on the course a treat. No tired feet at the end of the round highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, I also bought athletic insoles and the combo was fantastic to walk 3 golf courses in 3 days in New England
customer_reviews.author: don roy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great stability and very comfortable when walking the course. Just received my 4 th pair! I’m all in!
customer_reviews.author: rkhjr

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm 53 and have been golfing for forty years and these are the most comfortable golf shoes I've ever worn Excellent traction (I was a little worried at first, but not a problem) Amazing golf shoe. Order half size up, they run a touch small
customer_reviews.author: JRL

customer_reviews.title: Zappos doesn't stand behind product
customer_reviews.text: After three wears, the rubber sole on this golf shoe tore. After two attempts in contacting Zappos, we have not had any response from the company. Links golf to putt-putt golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B. Aman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and totally waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I wore this shoe through pouring rain and didn't have a drop on my feet. These are extremely comfortable shoes and grip the grass very well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Strydio

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs more cushioning
customer_reviews.text: This works well, decent traction, etc.. But my feet hurt after a round on firm ground. A little more cushioning inside would be very beneficial..
customer_reviews.author: Kim B. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Look AND Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Often you concede look for comfort, but these shoes nail both!
customer_reviews.author: John Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Leather in bad shape right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box as you can see in the pictures leather looked in bad shape. Ond only on one shoe. They look as if they were old. These should have been labeled as defective.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Alatorre

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Order 10.5 medium, so tight I can barely lace these shoes. Terrible fit
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes sold originally for around $160.00. I got them from Amazon for $85.00 Fit perfectly. Played 18 holes in them and they felt like any old pair.EXCELLENT quality and easily cleaned at the finish. May buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: rtaylor

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked good and quality good but wore one time and rubbed blisters on both heals
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were used. I expected new. Even worse they were not even cleaned, the soles were cracked. I actually thought this was some kind of joke!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Van Voltenberg

customer_reviews.title: They are highly rated on the web, there's a good reason
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes fit well, are comfortable to wear, no down-side as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I needed a quality golf shoe that was wide enough, was waterproof and wouldn't hurt my feet after walking 18 holes with a 25lb golf bag strapped to my back!
customer_reviews.author: Todd S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes keep my feet dry and are comfortable at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Wear marks and stained laces!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. However, the left shoe arrived in terrible condition. It was a gift and I had to explain it arrived like that. The worst! Can’t imagine a decent vendor shipping a product in this condition! Wear marks and stained laces!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve walked 3 rounds to this point and they are extremely comfortable and feel great on the course. I have a wide foot and got the 10 wide. They fit nicely
customer_reviews.author: Mark Villa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that I own these shoes less than a year and the entire side of the right shoe is ripped. I play golf once a week and mostly ride, but I never expected this from an Adidas product. No durability at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: michael ferretti

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Superior fit, comfort and look. Shoe is as good as advertised
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The boost is very comfortable compared to previous Adidas golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Watson

customer_reviews.title: surprised
customer_reviews.text: I usually stick with Adidas - I've purchased 18-20 Adidas golf shoes over the years - size 10 - and they ALWAYS fit - not this time. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bouley

customer_reviews.title: So good it’s almost cheating
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is mega comfortable! It has a bouncy feel when you walk and feel less fatigued after a round. Design is great, pairs well with shorts or pants.
customer_reviews.author: Lim Hsien Yao

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes Over 10 years playing with Adidas tour 360 This new design with out spikes will keep me another 10 years or more loyal to the brand
customer_reviews.author: Delfos Caro

customer_reviews.title: Style
customer_reviews.text: Very nice & comfortable shoes. I definitely recommend these shoes 👍
customer_reviews.author: Brk802011

customer_reviews.title: True To Size
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. I ordered a size 12 and it did not fit well. I reordered a size 12 wide and it fit perfect. I was able to send the smaller size back at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck E.

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the foot support, grip on grass and overall comfort. Could wear them all day long!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boost 360XT Spikelless
customer_reviews.text: Great spikelless shoe. Very comfortable straight out of the box. Similar fit as the Addidas 360 2.0. They might be a touch narrower but fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, comfortable and waterproof, just what I needed for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stanford Valley

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the footjoys I've had since the mid 90s. These new shoes are by far the best golf shoes I've ever had. I hope these last as long as the last ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes feel like you're walking on a cloud. Adidas makes excellent golf shoes and this is no exception. Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to. Little tight but to be expected. Quality appears normal, nothing too special.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe width suitable for munchkins.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Cut waaayyy to narrow for human feet. Based on the fit in the wide width I’d need a XXXXW shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Snug & comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice golf shoe. A little ostentatious but allowable for golfers.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Kapacinskas

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit , perfect. Just walked 7 rounds in Ireland and no issues! Great shoes...will never wear spiked shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I live Adidas golf. Great traction for spikeless. The boost is very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Marty Briles

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great. Super comfortable and work as advertised. Came fast and would purchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Luke E McKenney

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but my pair seemed to lack support in the heal. But love the spike less grip!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vieau

customer_reviews.title: Comfort +
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and extremely comfortable. Played 36 holes straight out of the box with no issues. Love my adi’s !!!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Wide size not very wide.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 11 wide and for all my other shoes, it's fine, but for these I can barely put my foot in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Novak

customer_reviews.title: The price of the shoe. I saw this at Edwin watts, was $199.00
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is so comfortable, one of the best golf Shoes I owned. Wish more different colors .
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Homerun
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes exceeded my expectations for comfort! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rick lien

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cushion
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes I have had. Lots of bounce but still firm.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Stylish comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 pairs of the Tour360 and love how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Nice spikeless golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice golf shoe. If you’re interested in transitioning to spikeless, this is a nice option.
customer_reviews.author: Yoda2616

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very comfortable. I have several pairs of this golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Yancey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever won. Shoes came in on schedule as well
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great kicks
customer_reviews.text: Feel great. Fit as promised. Not much break in needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: You will want to wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fit very well. I wear a 12 E. The 12 wide fit correctly for me. (Wide, not extra wide). They have excellent build quality. They have very good traction for spike-less design. The shoe feels very secure and stable on the foot. The biggest thing,,, They are comfortable to walk in for the whole round. Can't comment on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of spikeless golf shoes. They really geip well. Almost as good as my spiked shoes and they didn't leave marks all over the putting greens. They fit just right and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: J. MURRAY

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Tour360 Xt Spikeless Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: A premium look for the course. Designed for comfort, these men's golf shoes feature a leather and microfiber synthetic upper. A boost midsole gives you responsive cushioning throughout your round, while climastorm provides breathable protection in wet conditions.
feature_bullets: Puremotion outsole offers improved flexibility and grip with X-Traxion primary arches for grip and balance
Torsion X-stability bar from the ground up and INSITE sockliner for fit and balance
Full-grain leather heel lining for fit and durability
Breathable, water-repellent Climastorm upper while 360Wrap locks and supports your foot
